testcase.name: Invalid booking id
testcase.system-err: expected:<405> but was:<404> actions.Actions.assertStatusCode(Actions.java:21) steps.Steps.theStatusCodeShouldBe(Steps.java:28) ✽.the status code should be 404(file:src/test/resources/features/PartiaUpdateBooking.feature:11)
